name: Cool Porygon
author: Hiromichi Sugiyama
flavor_text: A Pokémon that consists entirely of programming code. Capable of moving freely in cyberspace.

attacks.name: Texture Magic
attacks.effect: You may change Cool Porygon’s Resistance to a type of your choice other than Colorless. If the Defending Pokémon has a Weakness, you may change it to a type of your choice other than Colorless. (Benching either Pokémon ends the effect on that Pokémon.)

attacks.name: 3-D Attack
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
